Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.project.compiler

[Java] Class GrailsProjectWatcher

        • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.project.compiler.GrailsProjectWatcher

        • Watches a Grails project and re-compiles sources when they change or fires events to the pluginManager.

          Authors:
          Graeme Rocher
          Since:
          2.0
